name: Silver Lining (rbkn)
description:
Silver Lining Weekly Game Jame 101 Entry, Theme "After the Storm"

Join Annabeth and her mighty fox Keanu in an adventure through the aftermath of a storm to find her father. Remember, every choice matters. 

Define your own story in Silver Lining. 

Controls: 

Movement: W/A/S/D 

Story Interaction: Press the designated button on the keyboard

Meet the Team! Developersadwitr, buckbeak and OriGreenLeafArtCallMyLawyer, BirdyBoi Credits Sound & Musichttps://freesound.org/
